tutorialEntries: I am trapped down here and need your help!
You see, I want to write a Script to free myself from this dungeon.
To help me with this you can click on the script part to the right and write the following: "Knight knight = new Knight();"
This will spawn a Knight who will do whatever you tell him to do. If you wrote exactly what I told you, he will be simply named "knight".
To give him a different name simply change the "knight" in "Knight knight = new Knight();" to whatever you want.
In order to escape from this dungeon we will need to collect the KEY and open the EXIT with it!
To collect the KEY we need a new Line of Code! For that press ENTER after clicking on your first codefield!
Now write: "knight.collect();". If you gave your Knight a different name you will have to replace "knight" with this name!
After that we will need to move our Knight towards the EXIT by calling his 'move()' method. For that write <name>.move();

The last thing we need to do now is open the EXIT. To do this create yet another codefield and write: "<name>.useItem();"
This will use the collected KEY and open the EXIT!
